forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West wind 2 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear. Low around 46, with temperatures rising to around 48 overnight. North wind 3 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the city awakens to a serene, sunlit morning, heralding a pleasantly mild day ahead. The forecast promises sunshine, with temperatures reaching a comfortable peak of 65 before gracefully retreating to around 58 as the afternoon settles in. The gentle northwest breeze whispers through the streets, a soft companion to the day’s clear conditions, enhancing the feeling of calm that envelops the city. 

Despite the bright forecasts, hints of the bay's marine layer linger on the outskirts, subtly veiling the distant hills. Those wishing to explore should prepare for an invigorating stroll along the waterfront or a leisurely visit to one of the neighborhood cafés. Dressing in layers is advisable; a light jacket or sweater to shield against the afternoon chill would be ideal. As the evening approaches, expect the temperature to drop to about 46 degrees, welcoming a peaceful night under a mostly clear sky. With such pleasant weather, an evening walk through the streets, perhaps accompanied by a soothing soundtrack of the city’s hum, seems the perfect way to embrace the beauty of the day.
